title: The two ways of playing League right
body:
...and probably any other game you can think of.

http://i.imgur.com/mYTSnpE.jpg

replies.body: I like to add a pinch of salt.

> [{quoted}](name=Kerrigan 4 Prez,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1qXqg4At,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-22T22:42:12.527+0000)
>
> FTFY

Every bronze ever.
By your name. are you a Shyvana player, or do you just like Dragons?
He's an ~~Ao Shin~~ Aurelion Sol main.
I will be to :P Not the stupid one that plays a new champion in ranked the day it comes out... BUt I will main that dragon if it kills me
I would, but Shenpai is my only.

Oh god no, not the Egg delivery quests. 

And I classify them as dragons. A subspecies sure, but still dragons.
Oh sure okay. I classify sandals as hats. Because I said so.
Hey, you have you opinion I have mine. I use Dragon as an overarching theme that contains Western, Eastern, Wyverns, Quetzalcoatl-like serpents, ect. If you dont thats fine.
yeah and I say shirts are hats too. Like you said. It's my "opinion"
Whats with the aggressiveness about this topic?
What aggressiveness?
This guy is a literal dragon stahp hes sensitive abtou it.
Your pretty much calling me an idiot for me saying that a Wyvern is a dragon.
How so?
*sigh* nevermind its not worth the effort
mhmm

Sicko.
Ahri is disgusting. Remove her E entirely rito pl0x.
so either go ham and tryhard or find a cheese tactic to win, i guess

^ this exactly (except that tryhard)

just go ham or go cheese

So Rengar top or Rengar top?
Love maining Rengar top...
Ham and cheese, sandwich teh carries.
{{champion:24}} Hi
100% banrate form me personally:D
Instructions unclear. Kicked from league for AFK; keyboard full of sandwich crumbs.

Dick stuck in fan ceiling.
Demoted to bronze 5.

I see three ways:
1. Go ham and outplay your opponents hard
2. Cheese the crap out of your opponents
3. Do something crazy and off-meta, and get smothered by 1 & 2, just like the paper towel here.
3 falls under the jurisdiction of 2
The difference between 2 and 3 is that with 2, your intent is to win. With 3, your intent is to have as much fun as possible, but you probably are going to lose.

naw, its just a different flavor of cheese, there is aged chedder, and then there is kraft american singles.

both of them are still cheese, its just a different kind.
wll you got playing ham and cheese i believe
Spam the chat or cheese the system, got it.
OMG! Some ppl hack this fudgin´ game. Not much fun anymore. Soooooo much salt{{summoner:31}}
As someone who once mained {{champion:89}} , I wholly approve of this message.
I have no idea what I'm supposed to get from this.
Go ham or use a cheese tactic :^)
That took me a while to get...feelsbadman
I don't get it.  I have failed.  *uninstall*
